Screenwriter: Nai-Hoi Yau, Yip Tin Shing, Kin Yee Au
Production Co: China Star Entertainment, Sil-Metropole Organisation, One Hundred Years of Film Co. Ltd.
Synopsis: A young fighter (Aaron Kwok) and an aspiring singer (Cherrie Ying) reawaken a drunken gambler's (Louis Koo) desire to prove his skills in the judo ring.
Title: Throw Down
